channel.title: Comments on: It’s incredibly sad I have to worry about killing the admin when i’m trying to play casually
channel.description: Welcome to the home of Battlefield V! Your place for discussion, help, news, reviews, questions, screenshots, videos, gifs, and anything else BFV related! Battlefield V is developed by DICE and produced by EA. This subreddit is ran by dedicated fans of the series and has no affiliation with EA or DICE.

item.title: By: Cunning-_linguist
item.dc:creator: Cunning-_linguist
item.description: Happened to me on both Tf2 and Mordhau on countless occasions before. Sad that you got kicked, but it gives you a weird big D energy.
item.content:encoded: Happened to me on both Tf2 and Mordhau on countless occasions before. Sad that you got kicked, but it gives you a weird big D energy.

item.title: By: Lock3down221
item.dc:creator: Lock3down221
item.description: It's the downside of any game that has some sort of rental server programs. It does help keep the server clean from cheaters in PC but there's always a salty admin.
item.content:encoded: It’s the downside of any game that has some sort of rental server programs. It does help keep the server clean from cheaters in PC but there’s always a salty admin.

item.title: By: The_Vibe_is_Eternal
item.dc:creator: The_Vibe_is_Eternal
item.description: As a frequent admin, kicking someone for killing you is absolutely ridiculous and childish.
item.content:encoded: As a frequent admin, kicking someone for killing you is absolutely ridiculous and childish.

item.title: By: Mgodisgod
item.dc:creator: Mgodisgod
item.description: Yeah op feels bad, some people just have tiny egos
item.content:encoded: Yeah op feels bad, some people just have tiny egos

item.description: Happened me on Bf4 last week

item.title: By: FreeCouponn

item.description: Happened to me when I was mowing people down with the MG42 yesterday.
